text: By the Law () is a 1926 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Lev Kuleshov.«Кинопоиск» открывает в Москве лекторий о советском кино It stars Alexandra Khokhlova, Sergei Komarov, and Vladimir Fogel. ==Actors== *Alexandra Khokhlova as Edith Nelson *Sergei Komarov as Hans Nelson *Vladimir Fogel as Michael Dennin *Pyotr Galadzhev as Harkey == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1926 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Kuleshov
title: By the Law
